articles.title: ‘He has everything to score 50’: Morgan Geekie is evolving into an elite goal scorer for Bruins
articles.description:
"The shot that he has, it's amazing. It's the best on our team.”

The post ‘He has everything to score 50’: Morgan Geekie is evolving into an elite goal scorer for Bruins appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Morgan Geekie is becoming a top goal scorer for the Bruins this season.
Geekie's shot is considered the best on the team, enhancing offensive strategies.
His performance could significantly boost Bruins' chances in upcoming games.

articles.title: Celtics reportedly exercise team option for 2024 1st-round pick Baylor Scheierman
articles.description:
The 6-foot-6 forward out of Creighton will remain in Boston through at least the 2026-2027 season.

The post Celtics reportedly exercise team option for 2024 1st-round pick Baylor Scheierman appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics exercise team option for Baylor Scheierman, securing him through 2027.
Scheierman, a 6-foot-6 forward from Creighton, joins the Celtics' roster.
This decision strengthens the team's future prospects for Boston fans.

articles.title: Keion White admits he wasn’t fit for Patriots’ scheme, while 49ers want to tap into ‘limitless potential’
articles.description:

summary: Patriots traded Keion White and a seventh-round pick to the 49ers.
White admitted he wasn't fit for the Patriots' defensive scheme.
49ers aim to develop White's potential, impacting future player trades.

articles.title: On the Cape and Islands, a new housing fix is gaining traction
articles.description:
Local leaders say luxury home sales could help pay for housing for the workers running the region.

The post On the Cape and Islands, a new housing fix is gaining traction appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Local leaders propose using luxury home sales to fund worker housing on Cape and Islands.
This initiative aims to address the housing shortage affecting seasonal workers in the region.
Increased affordable housing could stabilize the local economy and support year-round residents.

articles.title: Meet the vampire who went viral during a visit to Salem
articles.description:
Matthew Pruno went viral after a fan’s Facebook post about his mesmerizing look took off — now the Long Island cosplayer is embracing his inner vampire.

summary: Matthew Pruno, a Long Island cosplayer, went viral during his Salem visit.
